root: ^A familiar nightmare. You're in a library where books whirl around you like a storm, their pages screaming about tests, grades, and failure. The pressure is choking.

c-1: ^You close your eyes and take a slow, deep breath, accepting the anxiety instead of fighting it. The vortex of books slows and settles. (+30 HP, +30 Mana)
c-2: ^You curl up, shielding your head, and wait for the suffocating nightmare to pass on its own.

STR_Check_Success: ^You roar in defiance and smash a screaming textbook out of the air. A surge of power rushes through you! (+2 STR)
STR_Check_Fail: ^You try to fight back, but the pressure is too much. Panic drains your will. (-15 Mana)
